---
id: get-email-verification-link
title: "Get email verification link"
description: "The API generate an email verification link for the user. The link is sent to the user's email, allowing the user to verify their email address."
sidebar_label: "Get email verification link"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"
info_path: docs/seerportal-api
custom_edit_url: null
---

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get email verification link"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/sendEmailVerificationLink"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API generate an email verification link for the user. The link is sent to the user's email, allowing the user to verify their email address.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<details
  style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}}
  className={"openapi-markdown__details"}
  data-collapsed={false}
  open={true}
>
  <summary
    style={{}}
  >
    <h3
      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}
    >
      Query Parameters
    </h3>
  </summary><div>
    <ul>
      <ParamsItem
        className={"paramsItem"}
        param={{"name":"zone","in":"query","description":"The time zone in which email verification link should be valid. e.g: **Asia/Calcutta**.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","default":"Asia/Calcutta"}}}
      >
        
      </ParamsItem>
    </ul>
  </div>
</details><MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem

          className={"openapi-schema__required"}

      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"user_id"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int64"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","default":99080,"description":"The ID of the user requesting an email verification link. e.g: **99080** "}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs><div>
